title.rendered: The IIG Information Systems & Technology Program

content.rendered:
CRITERIA / REQUIREMENTS
Employed in or interested in the Insurance / Finance Industry
Able to travel to Sandton, Jhb
Must be a South African citizen with valid ID
Clear credit & criminal records.
Good English comprehension skills
Able to commit to the 12-month program
Adhoc lectures for employed persons
Starts from mid-June 2024

Your application does not guarantee selection for the GIFS IIG program. You will be invited to an interview.
Program value = R50 000. Fees are part-funded by SASRIA.
Cost for IIG Members = R5 000
Cost for Non-IIG Members = R8 000

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/3Ew1trEQCnEPAgny6
Application deadline: Friday, 24 May 2024
